name: Jeffrey K. Uhlmann
content: Jeffrey Uhlmann Skip to navigation Skip to content Associate Professor email uhlmannj@missouri.edu phone 573-884-2129 place 217 Naka Hall Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Biography Jeffrey Uhlmann is an associate professor in the Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science at the University of Missouri. He has published seminal work in the areas of information and sensor fusion, metric data structures and nonlinear estimation. He also has a long background in experimental music and filmmaking. He has been featured among the Worldâ€™s Top 2% Scientists List, according to a Stanford University study in 2020.
